Title: Provides for the review of policies and practices pertaining to emerging infectious disease outbreaks in correctional facilities
Summary: Provides for the review of policies and practices pertaining to infectious disease outbreaks in correctional facilities, including the treatment and prevention of the disease among incarcerated individuals and staff.
LawCode: Amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to review of policies and practices relating to infectious disease outbreaks in correctional facilities
